WRITING.TITLE: How is the game without all the DLC?
WRITING.TEXT: I bought the game a few years ago and haven't played in a while. I've noticed that Paradox has released a lot if DLCs in the meantime and now I wonder if I miss out on a lot by not owning them.
I'm not entirely sure about normal league matches, but for Champions League, Europa League und national team matches there's definitely no alcohol. It's probably the same for the league.
Yep, it's a thing. The good ones taste almost exactly the same as normal ones. They're even advertised as sort of an isotonic drink for when you exercise.
It's something at least... But there usually are lots of stands just outside selling regular beer. You still can't take it inside though.
In Germany yes, beer is available at every stadium. In Portugal on the other hand you only get alcohol free beer.
